welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ban Om Noi, Thailand! Known for its breathtaking scenery and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in the city's rich culture and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 2 hours by providing their passport or boarding pass at designated kiosks.
